title: Vase, ca. 1930
markings: On bottom in underglaze, printed on surface: LONGWY FRANCE under crown and badge (with grass and plant) in black; Handwritten into surface 3063; Handwritten underglaze "CJ"; Handwritten overglaze "D.5053"
creditline: Gift of Barbara and Max Pine
description: Roughly pear-shaped form with crackled cream base on sufrace.  Mouth of vase decorated in a blue glaze from which stripes of blue outlined in black, radiate down the vase. Blue conical forms comprised of yellow and cream triangular forms and red flowesr and leaves decorate the bottom section of the vase.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Glazed earthenware. Gift of Barbara and Max Pine. 1993-133-32.
